org.jchassis.event
Interface EventCoordinator

All Superinterfaces:
EventDistributor, EventSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultEventCoordinator
public interface EventCoordinator
extends EventSource, EventDistributor

An interface for an object that is both a source and and a distributor of events.
